=================================================

Apocalypse: The Rise of Hitler Infamous for his crimes against humanity, Hitler's rise to power was unexpected and devastating. But how could a political party so intolerant gain so much power under one man? [b]Using historical newly colourised and impactful footage[/b], 

Apocalypse: The Rise of Hitler is a two-part documentary which takes a remarkable look into the Nazis' ascent, exploring Hitler's path from mediocre student and failed artist to totalitarian dictator.



[b]This series seems to have 2 names
Apocalypse: The Rise of Hitler
Hitler's Rise - The Colour Films[/b]
